grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 渦中【カチュウ】vortex, maelstrom, whirlpool, (in the middle of a) scandal, controversy, quarrel, turmoil
極渦【キョクウズ】polar vortex, polar cell
戦渦【センカ】chaos of war, war turmoil
kun reading compounds: 渦【うず】whirlpool, swirl, eddy, vortex, maelstrom
渦巻き【うずまき】whirlpool, eddy, coil
寒冷渦【かんれいうず】cold vortex
極渦【きょくうず】polar vortex, polar cell
